reviews.text: PROS: Excellent management staff including the general manager and the housekeeping manager. They went out of their way to get me something to eat after the hospitality hours had ended and were gracious and friendly. Location is very close to Rte. 22 and the Lehigh Valley Airport. Supermarkets, restaurants and gas stations all very close. Abundant free parking.
reviews.title: Superlative Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: CONS: Location is very close to Rte. 22 and the Lehigh Valley Airport. Planes start taking off at about 6 AM, and the noise from Rte. 22 can't be avoided.
reviews.title: Staff very helpful and friendly

reviews.text: This is a typical, older Residence Inn. The rooms have been recently refurbished with new bedding. This location is great if you're passing through this area or need to be at the airport. I am Marriott Platinum Elite and have travelled a bit.The staff at this hotel is among the best I've encountered. Very professional.
reviews.title: Nice and quiet.
A nice spot
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed for one night in a studio. We were greeted warmly by staff throughout our stay and found both our room and the rest of the property to be quite nice. The best part though was after our arrival home. There was a call waiting on our answering machine asking if I left something behind. Turns out I left the AC adaptor for my laptop in the room. Not only did they return it, but overnighted it without charging me.

This property is clean and well maintained. I will use this hotel for future stays in this area. The Residence Inn does a good job preparing breakfast in the morning. I was there on a Saturday night so I did not have the happy hour. There are two restaurants within walking distance. The hotel has a nice exercise room. The staff is very professional and friendly. This is a great place to stay and relax after a day on the road.
reviews.title: Not That Bad
